messages.content: A Conservative government is dragging Britain towards a damaging hard Brexit. Sensible business leaders are ignored. Threats to the economy are dismissed. The country is bitterly divided. Any kind of opposition even inside the Tory party must be crushed.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need a strong opposition that will stand up for our NHS and our schools - both of which face damaging cuts under this government.

mentions.candidate: In Southport, elections are always a close race between local Lib Dems and the Conservatives. Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party can't win here and are going backwards everywhere. The Conservatives, again, were unable to find a local Southport candidate.
mentions.tacticalSituation: In Southport, elections are always a close race between local Lib Dems and the Conservatives. Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party can't win here and are going backwards everywhere. The Conservatives, again, were unable to find a local Southport candidate.

issues.brexitEurope: A Conservative government is dragging Britain towards a damaging hard Brexit.
issues.economy: Threats to the economy are dismissed.
issues.government: Any kind of opposition even inside the Tory party must be crushed.
issues.health: We need a strong opposition that will stand up for our NHS and our schools - both of which face damaging cuts under this government.

community.content: Your vote can elect a hard working, local Lib Dem MP to stand up for our NHS, our schools and to fight a damaging hard Brexit.

endorsements.endorsement: Your vote in Southport for strong local voice to provide a strong opposition to a government intent on leaving the single market and putting local jobs at risk.

quotes.text: Did you think it would come to this?

examples: A Conservative government is dragging Britain towards a damaging hard Brexit.
Threats to the economy are dismissed.
Any kind of opposition even inside the Tory party must be crushed.
Your vote can elect a hard working, local Lib Dem MP to stand up for our NHS, our schools and to fight a damaging hard Brexit.
A Conservative government is dragging Britain towards a damaging hard Brexit.
Your vote in Southport for strong local voice to provide a strong opposition to a government intent on leaving the single market and putting local jobs at risk.

In Southport, elections are always a close race between local Lib Dems and the Conservatives. Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party can't win here and are going backwards everywhere. The Conservatives, again, were unable to find a local Southport candidate.
A Conservative government is dragging Britain towards a damaging hard Brexit.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party can't win here and are going backwards everywhere.
